text: Ramgaijang is a village near Jiribam in Jiribam district of Manipur, India. ==Ramgaijang is located near the bank of the jiri river. Namdailong to the north,Jiri River east, Alubazaar to the west and digli village to south.== ==References== Category:Villages in Jiribam district
title: Ramgaijang
